predicate.note: Frames file for 'suspend' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Verbnet class put_spatial-9.2-1, but that's only one of two senses (and not the primary sense of suspend, either). Comparison to 'stop'.

example.name: boring transitive
example.text: Big Board Chairman John Phelan said yesterday that he could support letting federal regulators suspend program trading during wild stock-price swings.

example.name: one kind of secondary predication
example.text: The market also moved at early afternoon on news that Jaguar shares were being temporarily suspended *trace* at 746 pence ($ 11.80) each.

example.name: different kind of secondary predication
example.text: Before its shares were suspended *trace* from trading, Qintex Australia plunged to 16 Australian cents (12 U.S. cents) a share yesterday from 33 Australian cents Friday.

role.descr: agent, entity causing something to be suspended

example.name: didn't actually occur
example.text: John suspended the Christmas decorations from the ceiling.
